name: Shpion
summary_text: In the spring of 1941 German agent Wasser of the Abwehr holds an NKVD commissar hostage. Two soldiers, a boxer and a spy are the NKVD's only hope to rescue him.

name: El cartel de los sapos
summary_text: The life of Andres Lopez Lopez during his years involved with the Colombian Cartel aka "Cartel Norte del Valle".

name: I Am 24
summary_text: Subhendu, a middle-aged writer, falls in love with a much younger woman named Sheela. In order to woo her, he pretends to be a younger man.

name: Diminished Capacity
summary_text: A Chicago journalist suffering from memory loss takes leaves from his job and returns to his rural hometown, where he bonds with his Alzheimer's-impaired uncle Rollie and his old flame.

name: The Yellow Wallpaper
summary_text: After a devastating fire, Charlotte and John rent a countryside house and attempt to start life over, though Charlotte, upon seeing visions of her deceased daughter, retreats to the house's attic and pulls away from her husband and sister.

name: Pinocchio 3000
summary_text: The year is 3000. Geppetto, with the help of his faithful assistant, Spencer the cyber penguin, and by the holographic fairy Cyberina, creates Pinocchio, a prototype super-robot equipped for emotions.

name: Road
summary_text: A couple decide to pick up a hitchhiker, but he ends up being a psychotic stalker who puts in them in danger.

name: The President's Man: A Line in the Sand
summary_text: A counterterrorism specialist is assigned by the President to track down a terrorist who is suspected of planning to set off a nuclear device in the U.S.

name: Impulse
summary_text: Lottie is a vice cop in LA posing as a hooker and likes the action. She meets Stan, who's also single. He needs her for a major drug bust.

name: The Last of England
summary_text: The artist's personal commentary on the decline of his country in a language closer to poetry than prose. A dark meditation on London under Thatcher.

name: City in Darkness
summary_text: While in Paris for a reunion on the eve of World War II, Charlie finds that the murder of a hated businessman leads him to a conspiracy to smuggle arms to Germany.

name: The Mysterious Lady
summary_text: An attractive Russian spy seduces an Austrian officer in order to get some important plans, but when she actually falls in love with him, both of them are placed in a dangerous situation.

name: Red Devil
summary_text: An intertwining tale of sex, drugs, rock and woe.

name: Youth in Oregon
summary_text: A man is tasked with driving his embittered 80-year-old father-in-law cross country to be legally euthanized in Oregon, while along the way helping him rediscover a reason for living.

name: Studentfesten
summary_text: 1994. Three overage students go on a wild ride while crashing graduation parties.

name: Quién mató a Bambi?
summary_text: The story of a rich man, a group of kidnappers, and two friends and a lawyer who got themselves into a series of unexpected twists and turns to finally answer the question; Who killed Bambi?

name: Cabras da Peste
summary_text: Two hapless cops find themselves in over their heads as they cross paths with dangerous criminals while searching for Celestina, a beloved goat mascot.

name: Blood Tea and Red String
summary_text: A handmade stop-motion fairy tale for adults that tells the tale of the struggle between the aristocratic White Mice and the rustic Creatures Who Dwell Under the Oak over the doll of their heart's desire.

name: Barschel - Mord in Genf
summary_text: A conspiracy-theorizing filmmaker meets with a prospective producer in order to pitch a movie about the death of real-life German politician Uwe Barschel, in which the official ruling of suicide raised more questions than answers.

name: Reisen til julestjernen
summary_text: A small princess in a small kingdom in Adventureland disappears on Christmas eve. She has gone out to find the Christmas Star. The Queen follows and the King curses the Christmas Star, so it disappears for years, until young Sonja arrives.

name: La flûte à six schtroumpfs
summary_text: A villain named McCreep steals the Smurfs' magic flute, an instrument that makes people dance wildly, and uses it to rob them. The Smurf King sends out Peewit to track down the thief and retrieve the flute.

name: Bluebeard
summary_text: A World War I pilot whom everybody envies as a "ladykiller" actually is one. After he beds a woman he's after, he murders her.

name: Fools' Parade
summary_text: In 1935, after forty years in a West Virginia prison, three released convicts wish to open a legitimate business using the $25,000 earned in prison, but a crooked prison guard in cahoots with the town banker plans to defraud them.

name: The Proud Ones
summary_text: Marshal Cass Silver has to deal with his old nemesis, a corrupt gambler, and his hired guns come to town as well as recurring bouts of blindness.

name: Love at First Dance
summary_text: Dance instructor Hope falls in love with her latest student, Manhattan's former most eligible bachelor, Eric. The only problem is, he is about to be married to someone else in an extravagant society wedding.

name: Tiyaan
summary_text: Two youths, a Muslim and a Hindu, get trapped in a religious clash in North India. Can they escape from the situation?

name: Rodin
summary_text: An account of the famous French sculptor's romance with Camille Claudel.

name: American Warfighter
summary_text: Rusty Wittenburg is a Navy SEAL struggling to balance his family life and his job. He fights daily to maintain the line between reality and the nightmares his PTSD conjures up for him. Dedicated to his team and his mission, he is willing to give the ultimate sacrifice for his fellow brothers and teammates.

name: Philips and the Monkey Pen
summary_text: Ryan Philips is a school boy who is always up to mischief when it comes to studying the maths subject. His life is turned around when he discovers a magical pen at his antique collecting grandfather's house.

name: Au bonheur des ogres
summary_text: There's something odd about the Malaussène tribe; something fishy, some might even say abnormal...

name: Wer wenn nicht wir
summary_text: West Germany, early 1960s. Star crossed lovers Bern and Gudrun begin a life long affair in the stifling atmosphere of provincial Germany. Setting out to challenge the establishment they ...                See full summary »

name: The Dish & the Spoon
summary_text: Reeling from her husband's affair, Rose collides with a marooned teenager in a boarded-up Delaware beach town.

name: Chota Mumbai
summary_text: The daily lives of Vasco Da Gama and his friends in a fraction of Cochin, called Chota Mumbai is portrayed in this comedy.

name: Je te mangerais
summary_text: Marie leaves home to study the piano at the conservatory in Lyons. Through lack of money, she is obliged to share an apartment with Emma, a friend of the family who has lived alone since ...                See full summary »

name: 'D'
summary_text: Deshu, a mechanic from Dubai, comes home to Mumbai, and gets embroiled in a crime by accident. The film shows his meteoric rise from common, law-abiding man to underworld kingpin.

name: Ravanaprabhu

name: Petrol krallari
summary_text: Two inseparable friends find a gasoline source in their backyard and use the money to save their neighborhood from the greedy loan shark.

name: Jett Jackson: The Movie
summary_text: Jett decides to quit Silverstone and lead a normal life. On the day of his last episode he is hit on the head with a prop and in his dream he is Silverstone. He is the only one who realizes that this is a dream.

name: Team Spirit
summary_text: The story centers around a group of friends (and girlfriends) who have been playing football together for over 10 years, and who are now getting everything ready for their 500th match.

name: Murderous Maids
summary_text: Based on the true story of two chambermaids (the Papin sisters) of 1930s France who murdered their employer and her daughter.

summary_text: After World War II, a small French village struggles to put the war behind as the controlling Communist Party tries to flush out Petain loyalists. The local bar owner, a simple man who ...                See full summary »

name: Don't Go to Sleep
summary_text: A young girl begins seeing the ghost of her sister who died in an accident a year earlier.

name: Insiang
summary_text: The life of a young girl living with her mother in the slums of Manila becomes unbearable when her mother's young boyfriend moves in with them.

name: Tintorera: Killer Shark
summary_text: Two shark hunters flirt with an attractive British lady while hunting down a large tiger shark terrorizing the Mexican East coast.

name: The Spook Who Sat by the Door
summary_text: A black man plays Uncle Tom in order to gain access to CIA training, then uses that knowledge to plot a new American Revolution.

name: Sword of Sherwood Forest
summary_text: While King Richard is away at the Crusades, some Nottingham nobles and their Sheriff plot to confiscate estates of fallen Crusaders but Robin Hood and Maid Marian foil their plan.

summary_text: Autumn of 1941 in Salty Creek, a fishing village in South Carolina, two interracial lovers are swept up in the tides of history.

name: The Singer
summary_text: Ibrahim is a nightclub singer who, like other singers of that era and is being removed from the scene with the 1979 revolution. Eventually he becomes the singer of various ceremonies but he doesn't agree with them to be called Motreb.

name: Love's Unfolding Dream
summary_text: Belinda Tyler struggles to choose between her career aspirations as a doctor and her feelings for a New York lawyer who wants a traditional wife.

name: Raye makhfi
summary_text: A female election agent and a gun-toting soldier try to collect votes among the local islanders with mixed success.

name: Barsaat
summary_text: A naive young man and a rich city girl fall in love. Her stepfather, however, doesn't approve of the match and will stop at nothing to split the pair.

name: The Nesting
summary_text: A writer suffering from agoraphobia rents an isolated house so she can concentrate on her writing. She doesn't know that the house is a former brothel, and is inhabited by the ghosts of dead prostitutes.

name: Fear No Evil
summary_text: High school student turns out to be personification of Lucifer. Two arch angels in human form (as women) take him on.

summary_text: Man investigates the disappearance of two of his friends who were the guests of a sinister Austrian count.

name: The West Point Story
summary_text: A Broadway director helps the West Point cadets put on a show, aided by two lovely ladies and assorted complications.

name: Princess O'Rourke
summary_text: A pilot falls in love with a woman he believes is heading cross country to become a maid, little suspecting that she's actually a princess.

name: A Winter Princess
summary_text: Princess Carly, working incognito at a ski resort, must team up with the owner's brother, Jesse, to plan the resort's 50th anniversary celebration.

name: Turkey Shoot
summary_text: In the near future, a Navy SEAL-turned-war criminal is offered a chance for freedom by participating in a reality TV show that requires him to outwit a series of professional killers to survive.

name: A Golden Christmas
summary_text: A woman visits her parents for Christmas. Hearing that they've "sold" the house, she wants to buy it. At 9 she had a BFF in the woods nearby named Han Solo. She and the buyer are single, divorced and have a child each. Is he her Han?

name: The Crypt
summary_text: Six young criminals break into hidden catacombs and attempt to steal jewels, but some inhabitants are guarding the precious belongings. After being trapped in this dark maze of crypts, the group tries to escape alive.

name: Carny
summary_text: A devilish creature escapes from a carnival to wreak havoc on a small town.

name: Jimmy Carr: Comedian
summary_text: Recorded live in 2007, the Jimmy Carr: Comedian (Live) DVD sees funnyman Jimmy Carr sharing his cynical, but always hilarious, take on life's little absurdities.

name: Contact High
summary_text: An episodic comedy that follows the lives of four men living in Vienna.

name: Boudu
summary_text: Light-hearted, social comedy about the house guest from Hell. A modern remake of Renoir's classic film about a vagabond saved from drowning.

summary_text: Arumugam lands in the city to protest to a minister about water pollution in his village. Here, he gets involved in a battle against corrupt politicians and rowdies, who leave him practically dead.

summary_text: A homicidal twelve-year-old paperboy becomes obsessed with a woman and her daughter next-door, and he'll do anything to make his fantasy of the "perfect family" come alive.

summary_text: Jim Curtayne, formerly a successful defense attorney who is now a recovering alcoholic, attempts a comeback when he defends a neighbor's son facing a homicide charge.

name: Irandam Ulagam
summary_text: Two parallel love stories on two planets.

name: Swarmed
summary_text: The residents of a small town find themselves battling a swarm of hornets which has been sprayed by a super pesticide.

name: Cerberus
summary_text: A band of mercenaries steals Attila the Hun's fabled sword and inadvertently awakens the most feared creature in all of mythology - Cerberus, the monstrous three-headed dog with a thirst for blood.

summary_text: In the annual awards presentation, the nominated films include The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003), Lost in Translation (2003), Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World (2003), Mystic River (2003), and Seabiscuit (2003).

summary_text: A cynical doctor, who is dying of cancer, would like to know the meaning of his life. He has to fight for it or just get ready for death.

summary_text: A guardian angel has 24 hours to convince a soul that life on Earth is worth the effort.

name: Lighthouse
summary_text: Members of a sunken prison ship take refuge at an old lighthouse, unaware one of their most notorious criminals has taken shelter there as well.

name: Hélas pour moi
summary_text: Romance about Simon Donnadieu and his decision to leave his ever-loving wife Rachel.

name: Scalps
summary_text: A group of archeological students venture on Indian land for a dig. Unfortunately, they release an evil spirit who possesses one of them and starts killing the others.

summary_text: When a global pandemic forces a TV actress to escape to her rural hometown, an intruder from her past proves as dangerous as the encroaching virus.

summary_text: The military have captured and imprisoned a supernatural entity. And now it wants to play.

name: Mixed Kebab
summary_text: Ibrahim chooses to live with Kevin over marrying his cousin Elif.

summary_text: A robot boy and a human boy team up to save their respective parents, who are being held captive by the organization that funded the robot's creator.

name: Zebrahead
summary_text: A white, hip-hop loving teen falls in love with a black girl.

summary_text: When Colombian revolutionaries kidnap an American engineer, his brother and friends, faced with official inaction, hire a mercenary and mount the rescue operation themselves.

name: La semana del asesino
summary_text: After slaughterhouse worker Marcos accidentally kills a man during a fight, he begins to lose his grip on sanity. As his brutal crimes escalate and the body count grows, the killer must find a way to dispose of his victims.

summary_text: On an archaeological dig in Iraq, author Agatha Christie uncovers a series of murders.

name: In the Gloaming
summary_text: A loving mother, a son in search of peace, four people separated by more than miles. Now, in the twilight of their time together, reconciliation finally begins for a family who never really knew each other until it was almost too late.

name: More About the Children of Noisy Village
summary_text: There are only a handful of children living in Bullerbyn. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.

name: Erotic Nights of the Living Dead
summary_text: With a 20 year lease on an tropical island, horny John heads out with Fiona on a yacht skippered by horny Larry, to inspect the island for resort development. They meet Luna/Laura Gemser. John didn't expect zombies.

name: Zan xian sheng yu zhao qian Hua
summary_text: Beloved for its combination of thrilling combat choreography and hilarious physical comedy, the film tells the story of a humble cashier who discovers a plot to kill his small town mayor.

name: Zeppelin
summary_text: In 1915, frustrated with the German air-raids on London, British Intelligence sends Scots officer Geoffrey Richter-Douglas, who has German ancestry, to Germany, to find information about the latest German Zeppelin.

name: Anaparastasi
summary_text: A woman murders her husband, upon his return home after a long absence, with the complicity of the lover who has relieved her loneliness. Costas Ghoussis, an emigrant recently returned to ...                See full summary »

name: Robbery
summary_text: A group of British criminals plans the robbery of the Royal Mail train on the Glasgow-London route.

name: The Wheeler Dealers
summary_text: A big-time Texas wheeler-dealer (who's actually Ivy league-educated, but plays dumb) runs out of money, and goes to New York City to raise $1.5 million.

name: Shield for Murder
summary_text: When a brutal police detective Lt. murders a bookmaker's runner for $25,000 in cash, a deaf mute sees him do it and now he finds he must kill again to cover his tracks.

name: Torch Song
summary_text: A tough but unhappy Broadway star re-evaluates her life when she crosses paths with a blind pianist.

name: The Desperadoes
summary_text: A wanted outlaw arrives in town to rob a bank that has already been held up! His past and his friendship with the sheriff land them both in trouble.

name: In Old California
summary_text: During the California Gold Rush, Boston pharmacist Tom Craig sets up shop in Sacramento where he clashes with local town crook Britt Dawson.

name: King of Jazz
summary_text: American Pre-Code color film starring Paul Whiteman and his Jazz orchestra.

name: Through the Fire
summary_text: The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad.

name: Tum Bin 2
summary_text: After a skiing accident, Taran thinks her fiance is dead and grieves for months. Soon, Shekhar enters her life, helps her rediscover happiness and falls in love with her.

name: Swapnajaal
summary_text: Set in the riverside Chandpur suburbs of the '90s, "Swapnajaal" at its core is the story of Opu (Yash Rohan) and Shuvra (Pori Moni), two teenagers in 'young love'. Their blooming romance take a dramatic turn south when conniving influential businessman Aynal Gazi (Fazlur Rahman Babu), with the help of his trusted aide Thandu (Iresh Zaker) tactfully oust Shuvra and her family from their home. Opu ...                See full summary »

name: Hannah
summary_text: Intimate portrait of a woman drifting between reality and denial when she is left alone to grapple with the consequences of her husband's imprisonment.

name: Bicemo prvaci sveta
summary_text: The story about the founders of the famous "Yugoslav Basketball School" and the first gold medal at the Championships in Ljubljana in 1970, is based on real events and is dedicated to ...                See full summary »

name: Nachthelle
summary_text: Two couples visit a home from their past, and sexual tension brings out the worst in each other. Long-buried grudges resurface.

name: Flytrap
summary_text: When a man is held hostage in a twisted version of suburban San Fernando Valley, he slowly uncovers the reason for his capture and the miserable fate that awaits him-and humanity-unless he acts.

name: Solo Brathuke So Better
summary_text: 'Solo Brathuke So Better' is a love story between a young man who believes and preaches his philosophy of staying single in his college days, and a young woman who takes his ideology to ...                See full summary »

name: Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii
summary_text: An orphan kid who goes on to achieve name, fame and above all self belief.

name: Bone Eater
summary_text: Ancient Native American legend of the Bone Eater rises up and begins terrorizing the local townspeople.

name: Milionari de weekend
summary_text: Romania. The near future. The Russian Federation gives back the Thesaurus to Romania. Three boys and a girl, a dog, thieves, mobsters and a bag with millions. All in a summer weekend. Live the moment, take the money, the car and... Run!

name: Just Desserts

name: Il signor Robinson, mostruosa storia d'amore e d'avventure
summary_text: As a result of a shipwreck, modern Italian businessman finds himself stuck on a desert island. Like Robinson Crusoe he must find a way to return to civilization, but unlike him - a man of the 20th century is a completely different case.

name: Thirteen Women
summary_text: Ursula plots to murder 12 women with her supernatural powers.

name: Out of Tune
summary_text: Follows a celebrity financier who ends up in prison. After being assaulted by a gang of bikers in the prison, he ops for voluntary solitary confinement. During this time he joins the choir, aiming for the top of it's hierarchy.

name: Arjun Patiala
summary_text: This spoof comedy narrates the story of a cop Arjun Patiala (Diljit Dosanjh) and his sidekick Onidda Singh (Varun Sharma). Together, will they be able to accomplish their mission of a crime-free town with their goofy style of policing?

name: Dead Sunrise
summary_text: Dead Sunrise is about a group of friends that find a research lab in the woods only to unleash little flesh eating children onto the world.

name: The Competition
summary_text: The main character (Thora Birch) follows the "PIG Theory" and ends relationships after six months in order to avoid heartache until she meets a man (Chris Klein) who wants to disprove her theory.

name: Rise of the Dinosaurs
summary_text: A group of soldiers attempting to rescue a hostage from a terrorist crash land into unfamiliar jungles which are inhabited by a group of long hidden dinosaurs.

name: Steekspel
summary_text: During his 50th birthday party thrown by his wife, Remco's life takes a turn for the worse. His business partners are scheming behind his back to sell him out and his former mistress shows up pregnant.

name: Normal
summary_text: A deadly car accident brings together a group of previously unrelated people, each of whom is forced to deal with the emotional fallout.

name: Christmas Do-Over
summary_text: Kevin tries to be involved with his son and ex-wife's family for Christmas. During dinner, he thought his Christmas *day* couldn't be more screwed; his son suddenly wishes it was Christmas ...                See full summary »

name: Whatever Lola Wants
summary_text: A New York postal worker travels to Egypt to take belly dancing lessons from a legendary instructor.

name: Am I Beautiful?
summary_text: German people having trouble with love and identity.

name: Lucie Aubrac
summary_text: A love story or a tale of the resistance, this poignant movie tells both the haunting story of a French resistance cell in Lyon but also the love of Lucie Aubrac for her husband, and the ...                See full summary »

name: The Other Side of Sunday
summary_text: The Other Side of Sunday criticizes the small, and often tight church community. We follow the Preachers Daughter; Maria, in her journey to liberate herself from the stiff church community and her strict religious father.

name: Raw Justice
summary_text: Mayor Stiles' daughter Donna is killed the night after a lousy date with the shy Mitch. Of course this makes him the main suspect. When Mitch gets free on bail, Styles hires ex-cop Mace to follow him.

name: Elvis Gratton: Le king des kings
summary_text: A Quebecois Elvis impersonator is disillusioned to find a Chinaman participating in an Elvis contest. He later takes his wife on vacation to the island of Santa Banana.

name: The Romantic Englishwoman
summary_text: A marriage crisis between a writer and his wife leads her to flee to Germany and eventually return with another man, through whom the writer is going to overcome his writer's block.

name: Otpisani
summary_text: Careless lives of few Belgrade youths are shattered when Nazis occupy their town in 1941. Soon they join the resistance movement and their activities bring their names to Gestapo's ...                See full summary »

name: Too Late Blues
summary_text: Ghost is an ideological musician who would rather play his blues in the park to the birds than compromise himself. However, when he meets and falls in love with beautiful singer Jess ...                See full summary »

name: Hotel by the River
summary_text: It is the dead of winter and a poet invites his sons to join him at a hotel for a reunion. The hotel also hosts a newly single woman who has a friend keep her company and with whom she ...                See full summary »

name: 7 uczuc
summary_text: Fear, anger, sadness, joy, disgust, jealousy, shame. Adas Miauczynski returns to his childhood, when - like most of us - he had a big problem with naming the accompanying emotions. To ...                See full summary »

name: Hollows Grove
summary_text: A young filmmaker documents his ghost-hunting, reality show friends as their routine investigation of an abandoned orphanage turns into a nightmare from which they can't escape.

name: Phantom
summary_text: In Tokyo, a girl and her boyfriend spend a night talking about their life, their precarious condition and their difficulties in earning a living, finding their place in the world, if they ever have one.

name: Wisegal
summary_text: A drama centered around Patty Montanari, the widowed mother of two who went to work for her lover Frank Russo, a Captain in a Brooklyn crime family.

name: Monster Ark
summary_text: Archaeologist Nicholas Zavatero and his student find a vase with antique inscription on where Noah's Ark is hidden in the underlying monster called Tama. They decide to go looking, but things get out of control.

name: Two Drifters
summary_text: Pedro and Rui kiss after a first-anniversary dinner; Pedro drives home, dying en route in a crash. Another pair of lovers, Odete and Alberto, split over her desire to have a child. Pedro ...                See full summary »

name: Cinderella
summary_text: A young woman forced into servitude by her step-family gets a chance to attend the royal ball.

name: The Biggest Heroes
summary_text: The bank robbers Karsten and Peter are on the run in Sweden. With them is one of their teenage daughter.

name: North Star
summary_text: Set during the Alaskan gold rush of the late 1800s. In his efforts to gain control of a small mining town, Sean McLennon is buying up every mining claim that becomes available, usually ...                See full summary »

name: Dead of Night
summary_text: Three imaginative tales involving a vintage car that transports its driver back to 1926; the mistress of an old mansion terrified by vampires and a mother tormented by the spirit of her dead son.

name: You're Missing the Point
summary_text: The boyfriend (Cantinflas) of the servant of a rich industrial man, gets into the house in order to kill a mad dog. Suddenly this man appears so the servant tells him that Cantinflas is his...                See full summary »

name: Different from the Others
summary_text: Two male musicians fall in love, but blackmail and scandal makes the affair take a tragic turn.

name: Ice Sharks
summary_text: A group of scientists at a research facility based on Antarctica battle a breed of sharks that have invaded Antarctic waters.

name: The Beat Beneath My Feet
summary_text: A teenage boy discovers his unruly neighbour is really a disgraced Rock God who "died" 8 years ago owing a fortune in unpaid tax. The boy agrees not to reveal his secret on condition that he teaches him the dark arts of Rock Guitar.

name: Climax
summary_text: Multimillionaire Vijay Modi , offers One Crore to Navya ,to spend a night with him in his star Suite room and listen to his story. Navya takes the offer. The very next morning , Modi is brutally murdered.

name: Atlantis
summary_text: A soldier suffering from PTSD befriends a young volunteer hoping to restore peaceful energy to a war-torn society.

name: Mister America
summary_text: After representing himself and beating a murder charge, a concert promoter runs for the San Bernardino District Attorney's office against the prosecutor of his case.

name: P
summary_text: Whilst growing up in rural Thailand, a young orphan girl is taught the ways of magic by her grandmother. But when grandmother falls sick, Dau is lured to Bangkok to find work so that she ...                See full summary »

name: Man of the Century
summary_text: Fantasy-comedy about a young man who lives as if it is 1928 or so, and his encounters with modern-day women and modern-day criminals.

name: Equinox
summary_text: Twins, separated at birth and living opposite lives, are about to learn of each other- and the substantial inheritance they are entitled to.

name: Big Trouble
summary_text: Insurance agent plots with client to kill her nutty husband.

name: The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians
summary_text: In 1897, in a castle near the town of Werewolfville in the Carpathians, a slightly deranged Professor Orfanik experiments with his new inventions which include, even at this early date, television and a film camera.

name: Ljubi, ljubi, al' glavu ne gubi
summary_text: Mary and Bob continuing his love spend the summer in the voluntary youth but their parents affect the foolish. The peak occurs when the life Zika, after a brief flirtation with Marys mother implicate two German girls Elza and Giza.

name: Harry in Your Pocket
summary_text: A would-be criminal is taken in by a professional in the game, who teaches him how pickpockets work in teams.

name: Les démoniaques
summary_text: A gang of pirates rape the two sole survivors of a ship wreck. The violated girls are rescued by the strange inhabitants of a supposedly haunted island, where they are granted supernatural powers to strike revenge against the pirates.

name: Sidewalks of London
summary_text: Vivian Leigh charms and beguiles as does Charles Laughton and Rex Harrison,all of them in their innocence and unaffected excellence. A needful but blithe and hopeful era in London, after the internecine slaughter of World War I

name: A Christmas Gift from Bob
summary_text: Sequel to the feature film 'A STREET CAT NAMED BOB'.

name: Aame
summary_text: A free-spirited girl gets the shock of her life when she finds herself naked in an abandoned building after a late-night party.

name: Bi-mil-eun eobs-da
summary_text: THE TRUTH BENEATH follows a mysterious 15-day scandal of a politician and his wife as their daughter goes missing just before the national elections.

name: Lucky in Love
summary_text: When Mira's April Fool's Day tricks materialize, she finds herself promoted to the perfect job, dating the perfect man and living in the perfect home. Mira's newly upgraded life even ...                See full summary »

name: Bei tou zou de na wu nian
summary_text: A woman waking up with memory loss after going through a car accident only to find out that she had been divorced with her husband.

name: Louis Theroux: The City Addicted to Crystal Meth
summary_text: British documentarian Louis Theroux examines the toll meth has taken on several addicts in Fresno, California.

name: The App
summary_text: Loving girlfriend, family fortune, breakout movie role: he's got it all. Until an app awakens a powerful new yearning. While in Rome to shoot his first movie, Niccolò becomes obsessed and sent into a self-destructive spiral.

name: Stephen Fry: The Secret Life of the Manic Depressive
summary_text: Stephen Fry presents this documentary exploring the disease of manic depression; a little understood but potentially devastating condition affecting an estimated two percent of the ...                See full summary »

name: Testosterone
summary_text: Dean has been stumped for some time in his attempt to produce a follow-up to "I was a Teenage Speed Freak," his incredibly successful graphic novel. His fans expect great things from him ...                See full summary »

name: Holiday Heart
summary_text: A drag queen takes in a drug addict and her daughter and helps raise the daughter.

name: Solomon & Gaenor
summary_text: A tragic love story between a Jewish young man and a Welsh woman in the beginning of the century. The movie is mostly in English with parts in Welsh and Yiddish

name: Storm Boy
summary_text: Mike is a lonely Australian boy living in a coastal wilderness with his reclusive father. In search of friendship he encounters an Aboriginal native loner and the two form a bond in the care of orphaned pelicans.

name: A Gunfight
summary_text: Two aging gunfighters in need of money come to an agreement to organize an actual showdown between them and sell tickets for it. The townsfolk is more than interested to see the "show".

name: Psycho-Circus
summary_text: A circus becomes the location for stolen loot and murder.

name: Let's Not Get Angry
summary_text: Antoine helps two former acquaintances escape the country, who repay him with a debt transfer. All he has to do is collect from some Léonard Michalon, but for that he will have to go into much trouble to keep the man alive.

name: LKG
summary_text: A small-time politician dreams of becoming Chief Minister.
